title: BRIEF-Pure Alumina Says Completed A Review Of Strategic Direction Of Co
text:
BRIEF-Pure Alumina Says Completed A Review Of Strategic Direction Of Co

Stock Markets 24 minutes ago (Oct 29, 2019 10:14)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Pure Alumina Says Completed A Review Of Strategic Direction Of Co Oct 29 (Reuters) - Pure Alumina Ltd : * COMPLETED A REVIEW OF STRATEGIC DIRECTION OF COMPANY * ELECTED TO PLACE DEVELOPMENT OF YENDON HIGH PURITY ALUMINA PROJECT ON HOLD UNTIL MARKET CONDITIONS IMPROVE * CONCLUDED THAT GOLD IS COMPANY'S PREFERRED COMMODITY GOING FORWARD * COPPER PROJECTS WOULD ALSO BE CONSIDERED SHOULD A SUITABLE OPPORTUNITY PRESENT.

BRIEF-Pure Alumina Says Completed A Review Of Strategic Direction Of Co
description: BRIEF-Pure Alumina Says Completed A Review Of Strategic Direction Of Co
